price: 118. Allâh cursed him. And he [Shaitân (Satan)] said: "I will take an appointed portion of your slaves.
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
